business.title: Nifty slides below 25,350; European mkt opens higher
business.description: At 13:30 IST, the barometer index, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 64.81 points or 0.08% to 82,897.90. The Nifty 50 index shed 35.05 points or 0.14% to 25,348.25.

business.title: Trading strategies in stocks that turned ex-bonus, split this week
business.description: KIMS, Monarch Networth can potentially rally up to 11% from adjusted stock price; whereas, Bigbloc Construction and Andhra Papers may witness weakness in the near-term; suggests technical charts.

entertainment.title: Mark Ruffalo, Ramy Youssef, Riz Ahmed, Susan Sarandon and more sign SAG-AFTRA open letter to protect pro-Palestine actors against blacklisting
entertainment.description: The letter claims over 40,000 Palestinians have been killed and millions displaced, highlighting the need for the union to take a stand against the targeting of civilians, healthcare workers, and journalists

entertainment.title: Hina Khan Finds Strength In Mahima Chaudhry's Story: 'Her Hardships Shaped My Life'
entertainment.description: Actress Hina Khan shared a picture with cancer crusader Mahima Chaudhry and said that the Bollywood star’s hardships became her life lessons.

entertainment.title: Arjun Kapoor Scolds A Paparazzi For Pointing Cameras On Malaika Arora's Face
entertainment.description: Arjun Kapoor angrily asks a photographer to maintain distance from Malaika Arora as he tries to capture her grief in the cameras.

politics.title: Wang Yi, Ajit Doval agree to work for improvement of bilateral ties: Chinese Foreign Ministry
politics.description: China and India agree to implement the consensus reached by the heads of the two countries, enhance mutual understanding and trust, maintain continuous communication, and create conditions for boosting bilateral ties

politics.title: Arvind Kejriwal will campaign in Haryana, party will fight polls with double energy: AAP State chief
politics.description: People want to bring the AAP to power and we will win the polls, says AAP Haryana chief Sushil Gupta

politics.description: He [Arvind Kejriwal] should immediately resign after this, says BJP spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia

sports.title: One of those two will make a lot of runs: Glenn Maxwell on Smith and Kohli
sports.description: India will play a 5-match Test series in Australia starting on Nov 22; Steve Smith and Virat Kohli will feature in Border-Gavaskar Trophy

sports.title: Shreyas Iyer fails in Duleep Trophy: Is time running out for India batter in Tests?
sports.description: Team India's home season is all set to commence with the two-match Test series against Bangladesh on September 19. Ahead of the series, India's domestic season also got underway with the Duleep Trophy that saw many senior team players including Shreyas Iyer featuring in the first round. Iyer is named the captain of India D who lost the opening game to India C. He couldn't make a comeback to the Test team despite scoring a quick fifty in the second innings of the first round and is plying his trade in the second round against India A.

sports.title: India TV Sports Wrap on September 13: Today's top 10 trending news stories
sports.description: India's Paralympics athletes met Prime Minister Narendra Modi and were felicitated at an event later in the day in New Delhi on Thursday, September 12. PM Modi spoke to the likes of Navdeep, Simran, Sumit Antil, Nishad Kumar among others while also talking to coaches and physios. On the other hand, Indian all-rounder Hardik Pandya shared pictures and videos of him training with the red ball. Maybe a sign of things to come? Hardik last played a Test match for India six years ago in England. All that and more in our Sports Wrap for today.
